name: Flipaclip Recreate
description: When Cuberto - one of the most renowned design agencies in the world showcased a project called 'Flipaclip' a few months ago, I was amazed at the same time curious about how they achieved it. As someone who loves pushing Figma to its limits, I decided to recreate the entire project - yes you guessed it right - only using Figma. Here's the end result!
